title: Anton Suurkonka
text: Anton Suurkonka (12 August 1886, <a href="Valkeala">Valkeala</a> - 31 March 1964) was a <a href="Finland">Finnish</a> farmer, business executive, lay preacher and politician. He was a member of the <a href="Parliament%20of%20Finland">Parliament of Finland</a> from 1930 to 1936, from 1939 to 1945 and again from 1948 to 1951, representing the <a href="Centre%20Party%20%28Finland%29">Agrarian League</a>.
